# Rotation3D.SlerpPath.longest

**Case**

Spherical linear interpolation along the longest arc between two rotations.

## Declaration

```swift
case longest
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **Rotation3D.SlerpPath.automatic**: Spherical linear interpolation along the automatically selected arc between two rotations.
- **Rotation3D.SlerpPath.shortest**: Spherical linear interpolation along the shortest arc between two rotations.
